Kuidas sa nii lihtsa asja peale ei tulnud!
context: Asja is the genitive singular and partitive singular form of the Estonian word 'asi'. It's a versatile word that can mean many things depending on context: a physical object or thing, an issue or matter to be discussed, a legal case, a business or affair, or the cause/reason for something. Asja appears in various compound words and is commonly used in everyday Estonian language.
